009package ImageJ_Demos;
010
011import java.util.Random;
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016
017/**
018 * Fills the active image with uniform noise.
019 * 
020 * @author WB
021 *
022 */
023public class Make_Uniform_Noise implements PlugInFilter {
024        
025        @Override
026        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
027                return DOES_8G;
028        }
029        
030        @Override
031        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
032                Random rg = new Random();
033                int w = ip.getWidth();
034                int h = ip.getHeight();
035                for (int v = 0; v < h; v++) {
036                        for (int u = 0; u < w; u++) {
037                                ip.putPixel(u, v, rg.nextInt(256));
038                        }
039                }
040        }
041
042
043}
044
